50s/
                4 22/
				farmer 1000 124 0 Haley 5 20 2/
				pause 1000/
				playSound doorClose/
				warp farmer 2 24/
				pause 200/
				move farmer 0 -1 0/
				move Haley -3 0 2/
				speak Haley "Oh, hi there! Can I help you, @?"/
				pause 100/
				emote farmer 40/
				speak Haley "You need help and you think I'm the person to ask?$0#$b#Hm... I'm intrigued. What do you need?"/
				globalFade .011/
				viewport -1000 -1000/
				message "You tell Haley about Penny's passion for teaching and the items she needs to enrich her students' learning experiences.#You ask Haley if she can help you with one of the things Penny needs."/
				warp Haley 6 6/
				warp farmer 5 6/
				positionOffset farmer 0 14/
				faceDirection farmer 1/
				faceDirection Haley 3/
				globalFadeToClear .011 true/
				viewport 6 8/
				pause 1000/
				speak Haley "Oh my...$8#$b#That's such an adorable idea.$8#$b#I'm impressed by your devotion to your wife.$8#$b#I wish I could find someone as passionate as you are.$l#$b#Let me see what I can do.$h"/
				move Haley 0 2 2/
				move Haley -3 0 3/
				faceDirection farmer 2/
				emote Haley 8 true/
				pause 300/
				faceDirection Haley 0/
				pause 300/
				faceDirection Haley 2/
				pause 350/
				move Haley 4 0 1/
				faceDirection farmer 1/
				faceDirection Haley 1/
				emote Haley 8 true/
				pause 300/
				faceDirection Haley 0/
				pause 300/
				faceDirection Haley 2/
				pause 550/
				emote Haley 16 true/
				jump Haley/
				speed Haley 4/
				move Haley 0 -3 1/
				move Haley 1 0 0/
				pause 900/
				playSound pickUpItem/
				pause 500/
				move Haley 0 1 3/
				move Haley -2 0 3/
				speak Haley "Here, you can have this!$h"/
				pause 200/
				faceDirection farmer 2/
				showFrame farmer 57/
				addTemporaryActor PinkCamera 16 32 5 5 2 false/
				playSound achievement/
				pause 300/
				message "Haley hands you a polaroid camera she had in a drawer."/
				playSound pickUpItem/
				warp PinkCamera 1000 1000/
				showFrame farmer 0/
				faceDirection farmer 1/
				pause 100/
				speak Haley "It's an old polaroid camera.$h#$b#It prints photos out instantly, so it would be perfect for Penny.$0#$b#I don't need it anymore because I have a new camera and a special dark room for developing my pictures.$0#$b#I hope she enjoys using it and the kids enjoy seeing the photos.$0"/
				pause 100/
				emote farmer 32/
				speak Haley "And hey, if you ever need my help or advice with anything, just let me know."/
				globalFade/
				viewport -1000 -1000/
				playSound healSound/
				removeQuest 162791/
				addQuest 162792/
				message "You have collected all the necessary items to help Penny achieve her dream of becoming a better teacher."/
				end dialogue Haley "Penny is such a lucky woman! I really misjudged you in the beginning, @.$l#$e#Well, enjoy the camera, and let me know if you need anything else."
